mapper.insert: INSERT INTO charge_coin_history(history_no, user_no, amount) VALUES(charge_coin_history_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userNo}, #{amount})
mapper.select: SELECT history_no, user_no, amount, reg_date FROM charge_coin_history WHERE history_no > 0 AND user_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY history_no DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pay_coin_history(history_no, user_no, item_id, amount) VALUES(pay_coin_history_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userNo}, #{itemId}, #{amount})
mapper.select: SELECT a.history_no, a.user_no, a.item_id, b.item_name, a.amount, a.reg_date FROM pay_coin_history a INNER JOIN item b ON a.item_id = b.item_id WHERE a.history_no > 0 AND user_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY a.history_no DESC
